text: Giuseppe Galante (2 September 1937 - 20 December 2021) was an Italian rower. Galante was born in Domaso, Italy. He won a silver medal at the 1960 Summer Olympics and at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Italian rowers
title: Giuseppe Galante
